sentences.sContent: What annoyed him most was that he had received no apology.
sentences.sCn: 最令他生气的是没人向他道歉。

sentences.sContent: It really annoys me when I see people dropping litter.
sentences.sCn: 看到别人乱丢垃圾我非常生气。

sentences.sContent: She annoyed him with her stupid questions.
sentences.sCn: 她那些愚蠢的问题令他很恼火。

words.tran: 恼人地；烦人地；令人不快地（annoying的副词形式）

trans.tranCn: 使烦恼， 使生气； 骚扰
trans.tranOther: to make someone feel slightly angry and unhappy about something
